title: Sketchpad

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Check to see if someone's role is Creative. If it is not, immediately deal an Unstoppable Attack to them. If they survive, you will force reroll their role to another Creative role from the same alignment.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-All roles are creative other than:
> Roles that are literally just copies of another role from the GIM thread or from other games
> Example: Post 94 Jester
> Roles that are almost the same as another role from the thread or from other games, but with one or two difference that isnt enough to make it original.
> Example: Post 2248 Vigilanter
-In cases where the identical roles are two roles from the thread, such as Post 130 Icy Rock and Post 2243 Ice Cube, the role with the lowest Post Number will be considered as Creative, and all the other copies wont.
-This cannot spawn unless at least 1 non Creative role spawns.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure all roles alive at the end of the game are Creative.

desc:
